channel.title: Works on Kevin McGowan's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Works on Kevin McGowan's Portfolio

item.title: Thesis Documentation
item.description: This is the video presentation of my senior thesis entitled, Tangible HTML.For a quick understanding of the project enjoy the video below, for a more thorough read into the project please visit my Thesis page.

item.title: Mapping Music
item.description: Following my love of music and passion for visualizing data, I have created a tool that is used to create unique visualizations of any song that is brought into the program. Inspired by Casey Reas’s work, I built a program of objects and rules. All objects have a form and a simple set of rules. An example includes form no. 1: A circle that tries to move away from all other circles.

item.title: Rubens Tube
item.description: Built as my final project of freshman year, the rubens tube was designed as a crossover project from a traditional physics experiment to a contemporary art piece. In physics, the rubens tube is a simple experiment made for visualizing sound waves with fire. It, at its most basic aspect, is a BBQ with a speaker attached. As the speaker creates sound, the pressure in the tube fluctuates based off of the sound waves.
